description: It would take the input as claim document and generate a detailed summary and also give a suggestion that whether to approve, reject or investigate the claim document.
name: claim document processing agent

miniAgents.name: Summary & Decision Agent
miniAgents.scope: Generates a structured summary of the claim, highlighting key details. Integrates findings from previous agents to decide claim approval, rejection, or further investigation. Provides justifications for decisions, making them auditable and explainable.

intents.name: process_document_upload
intents.description: take file as input and convert it into images and extract the data from images in structured format.

miniAgents.name: Fraud Detection Agent
miniAgents.scope: Detects fraudulent patterns such as overbilling, unnecessary treatments, and fake prescriptions. Flags suspicious claims for further manual review.

intents.name: detect_fraudulent_patterns
intents.description: Identify overbilling, fake prescriptions, or falsified medical reports.

miniAgents.name: Financial Verification Agent
miniAgents.scope: Checks if the claimed amount aligns with itemized charges. Identifies excessive charges, non-covered expenses, and cost anomalies.

intents.name: validate_claim_amount
intents.description: Detect overpriced treatments or incorrect calculations.

intents.name: flag_duplicate_charges
intents.description: Detect duplicate charges or inflated bills.

miniAgents.name: Medical Consistency Check Agent
miniAgents.scope: Verifies whether prescribed medications, treatments, and procedures align with the reported injury or surgery.

intents.name: verify_treatment_consistency
intents.description:
Cross-check if diagnosis, prescribed treatment, and procedures align correctly.
Identify mismatches in medications with injuries, or surgeries.

intents.name: detect_unnecessary_treatments
intents.description: Flag treatments/medications that seem irrelevant or excessive based on the patientâ€™s condition.

miniAgents.name: Document Classification Agent
miniAgents.scope: Identifies and categorizes documents as medical bills, hospital bills, discharge summaries, lab reports, etc.

intents.name: classify_document_type
intents.description: Identify whether the document is a medical bill, hospital bill, lab report, discharge summary, etc.

intents.name: detect_missing_documents
intents.description: Check if any required documents are missing for claim processing.

miniAgents.name: Document processing Agent
miniAgents.scope: Accepts claim documents. Converts PDFs to images. Extract text from the images, Cleans and structures extracted text.

intents.name: generate_claim_summary
intents.description: Provide a structured summary of the claim, including findings from all previous sub-agents.

intents.name: make_final_decision
intents.description: Approve, reject, or escalate the claim based on combined analysis.
